description:
Prepare to light those tiki torches! With over 50 island-inspired recipes, this Hawaiian cookbook app is the perfect way to plan your next luau or Polynesian-themed menu, or even recreate the fond memories of your last island vacation. 

From the perfect Mai Tai to Huli Huli Chicken, this collection of recipes is sure to bring you a piece of the Pacific.

With the purchase of this app you will have access to a variety of Hawaiian-themed recipes all in one convenient location, including delicious appetizers, unique cocktails, tasty salads, tropical sides and impressive desserts.

Here is a sampling of the included recipes:

Pupus (Appetizers)
- Coconut Shrimp Skewers
- Ahi Poke
- Maui Onion Dip
- Bacon-wrapped pineapple
- Spam musubi

Salads
- Honey-Lime Fruit Tossed Salad
- Sesame Cabbage Salad
- Papaya–Avocado Salad 
- Potato-Mac Salad
- Tropical Salad with Hawaiian Vinaigrette

Soups
- Miso
- Pho
- Saimin
- Hawaiian Lime
- Portuguese Bean Soup

Main Dishes
- Hawaiian Ribs
- Huli Huli Chicken
- Kalua Pork
- Lau Lau
- Loco Moco
- Macadamia Nut Crusted Mahi Mahi
- Teriyaki Beef Skewers

Desserts
- Banana-Pineapple Upside Down Cake
- Chocolate Chip Mac Nut Cookies
- Coconut Cream Pie
- Guava Cake
- Haupia Pudding
- Mango Bread

Beverages
- Mai Tai
- Pina Colada
- Blue Hawaiian
- Lava Flow
- Pineapple Iced Tea (or Plantation Iced Tea)

Extras (Sauces / Condiments)
- Coconut Relish
- Mac nut dressing
- Mango Cream Sauce
- Orange Soy Vinaigrette
- Pineapple Wasabi Aioli
- Spicy Sweet Hawaiian Salsa

* No internet connection necessary! Works off-line *
